name: 24XX DEMON STEEL
description:
THE CRUCIBLE, a city where humanity and inhumanity alike toils in its grimy, damned streets, watched over by a legion of merciless ‘angels’. With no other options left, you sold your souls to a fiendish patron - break this city’s chains before you’re dragged to Hell for all eternity.

DEMON STEEL is a lo-fi, sci-fi, cyberDEMONpunk RPG based on the 24XX system by Jason Tocci. 

  • Take on the role of diabolic hackers, fallen cybernetic angels, silver-tongued tempters and demonic mercs, in a fight against the city's self-styled heavenly order.
  • Grow the size and power of your infernal covenant and upgrade your base of operations.
  • Employ 20 devastating boons granted to you by your fiendish patron - if you can satisfy their desires.
  • Includes rolling tables for jobs, NPCs, locations around the city of the Crucible and extra-special desires of your patron.

THEME SONG: "Inception" by The Unguided.
